properties.name: A Roadside Attraction
properties.notes: Divey neighborhood bar with quirky decor and a patio

properties.name: Baerlic Brewing
properties.notes: One of Hans's favorite breweries in town — flagship taproom with pizza

properties.name: Bamboo Sushi (28th)
properties.notes: Sustainable sushi, definitely not super traditional but yummy

properties.name: Better Days Cafe
properties.notes: Local neighborhood coffee spot

properties.name: Broder Café
properties.notes: Scandinavian-inspired brunch — browse records next door while you wait, forever

properties.name: Cat's Paw Saloon
properties.notes: My neighborhood local, big back patio (but smoky)

properties.name: Coava Coffee Roasters (Grand)
properties.notes: Quality espresso, cavernous industrial space with a lot of room for laptoping.

properties.name: Company Wine Bar
properties.notes: Great natural wine selection and wine club. Converted garage space off Belmont.

properties.name: Daydream
properties.notes: Great wine curation and vibe, interesting wine cocktails.

properties.name: Dear Sandy
properties.notes: Coffee by day, bar by night — a Portland classic

properties.name: Double Dragon
properties.notes: Huge outdoor patio

properties.name: Dream Deli
properties.notes: Jewish-Italian deli with PNW soul. Daytime only.

properties.name: Expatriate
properties.notes: Vibe-y vietnamese-inspired cocktails + vinyl

properties.name: Harney Street Cafe
properties.notes: Cute neighborhood spot with cozy mom-vibes. Great salmon Benedict. Waffles are popular.

properties.name: Hopworks Brewery
properties.notes: Organic brewpub with solid food, regular lunch spot for me

properties.name: Horse Brass Pub
properties.notes: Classic Portland English pub — been around forever

properties.name: J & M Cafe
properties.address: 537 SE Ash St, Portland, OR 97214, USA
properties.notes: Old-Portland feel, elevated diner

properties.name: La Bonita
properties.notes: Decent burritos, good margaritas

properties.name: Lardo
properties.notes: Decent sandwiches though used to better — better in-person than delivery

properties.name: Lauretta Jean's
properties.notes: Incredible pie — often a scene (and a wait)

properties.name: Little Beast Brewing
properties.notes: Beer garden on the Division strip — sour and farmhouse ales

properties.name: Magna Kusina
properties.address: 2525 SE Clinton St, Portland, OR 97202, USA
properties.notes: Amazing Filipino food — rich and filling, bring your appetite

properties.name: Meat Cheese Bread
properties.notes: Excellent sandwiches & breakfast burritos, been there a million years, Old Portland

properties.name: Oma's Hideaway
properties.address: 3131 SE Division St, Portland, OR 97202, USA
properties.notes: Malaysian-stoner fusion — sambal egg yolk fries are worth the trip alone

properties.name: Pho Hathanh
properties.notes: Neighborhood Vietnamese

properties.name: Pizza Thief
properties.address: 1126 SE Division St unit 200, Portland, OR 97202
properties.notes: Good sourdough-crust pizza on Division

properties.name: Puff Coffee
properties.notes: Started by former Stumptown folks, tiny

properties.name: Rangoon Bistro
properties.notes: Burmese thokes and curries — the pork noodles are dangerously reorderable

properties.name: Rose & Thistle Public House
properties.notes: British pub with a cool patio

properties.name: Stumptown Coffee Roasters (Belmont)
properties.notes: The Belmont outpost, grungier than the Division one

properties.name: Stumptown Coffee Roasters (Division)
properties.notes: Cozy spot — used to be Hans's neighborhood coffeeshop

properties.name: The Baker's Mark
properties.notes: Great sandwich spot, lunch only

properties.name: Toya Ramen & Bar
properties.address: 803 SE Stark St, Portland, OR 97214, USA
properties.notes: Outstanding spicy miso ramen

properties.name: Wallflower Coffee Company
properties.notes: Local neighborhood coffee spot

properties.name: Wayfinder Beer
properties.notes: Award-winning lager-centric brewery in historic warehouse, large dining hall and patio. Cool classic horror-themed label art.

properties.name: Yoko's Japanese Restaurant and Sushi Bar
properties.notes: Solid neighborhood sushi spot - we call it the "Cheers" of sushi

properties.name: Clinton Street Record & Stereo
properties.notes: Local SE institution — records and stereo equipment

properties.name: Mississippi Records
properties.notes: Legendary Portland record shop — weird and wonderful selection

properties.name: Music Millennium
properties.notes: Portland institution — huge selection

properties.name: Passenger Seat Records
properties.notes: NE Portland record shop

properties.name: Prospector Records
properties.notes: Division corridor record shop

properties.name: Tomorrow Records
properties.notes: Inner Hawthorne record shop

properties.name: Melville Books
properties.notes: Tiny Alberta St bookshop with great curation

properties.name: Powell's Books on Hawthorne
properties.notes: SE outpost of Powell's — more manageable than downtown

properties.name: Powell's City of Books
properties.notes: The legendary Portland bookstore — a full city block

properties.name: Selected Stories
properties.notes: Outstanding literary bookstore run by a nice British guy

properties.name: Caseus Diem
properties.notes: Cheese shop on Division, generous samples and lovely proprietor

properties.name: John's Marketplace
properties.address: 3560 SE Powell Blvd, Portland, OR 97202, USA
properties.notes: Massive beer selection — Portland institution

properties.name: Laurelhurst Market
properties.notes: Butcher counter + steakhouse

properties.name: Providore Fine Foods
properties.notes: Fancy grocery experience — bakery, florist, specialty goods

properties.name: Wellspent Market
properties.notes: Delightful bougie neighborhood market with good sandwiches

properties.name: Clinton Street Theater
properties.notes: Neighborhood institution — Rocky Horror Saturdays

properties.name: Hollywood Theatre
properties.notes: Portland's nonprofit cinema — great programming, historic building

properties.name: Laurelhurst Theater
properties.notes: Second-run movies, beer, cheap — good beer, bad pizza

properties.name: PAM CUT's Tomorrow Theater
properties.notes: Portland Art Museum's cinema on Division

properties.name: Holocene
properties.address: 1001 SE Morrison St, Portland, OR 97214, USA
properties.notes: Intimate club space — electronic and indie crossover, good for dancing, tight sightlines.

properties.name: Process
properties.address: 5040 SE Milwaukie Ave, Portland, OR 97202, USA
properties.notes: Tiny club, the only place I can go dancing and not feel like the oldest person there.

properties.name: Revolution Hall
properties.address: 1300 SE Stark St #203, Portland, OR 97214, USA
properties.notes: Former high school auditorium with excellent acoustics and a rooftop bar. Mid-size acts, seated or standing depending on the show.

properties.name: Wonder Ballroom
properties.address: 128 NE Russell St, Portland, OR 97212, USA
properties.notes: Historic 1914 lodge turned concert venue — ornate details, balcony seating, and reliably good sound for a room this size.

properties.name: Blue Sky Gallery
properties.notes: Nonprofit photography gallery — rotating exhibitions, darkroom-adjacent interest.

properties.name: Crystal Springs Rhododendron Garden
properties.notes: Peaceful garden close to home — free most of the year, best in spring bloom.

properties.name: Portland Art Museum
properties.address: 1219 SW Park Ave, Portland, OR 97205, USA
properties.notes: Oregon's oldest art museum — recently remodeled with expanded galleries

properties.name: Portland Japanese Garden
properties.address: 611 SW Kingston Ave, Portland, OR 97205, USA
properties.notes: One of the most authentic Japanese gardens outside Japan — stunning year-round

properties.name: Blue Moon Camera & Machine
properties.notes: Film cameras, darkroom supplies, processing — Portland institution for analog photography

properties.name: Citizens Photo
properties.notes: Full-service photo lab

properties.name: Crosscut Hardwoods
properties.notes: Excellent lumber supplier — domestic and exotic hardwoods

properties.name: Mountain Shop
properties.notes: Climbing and hiking gear — Portland mountaineering institution
